title: F/S F/T Red Ty Cobb PSA 2.5
author: trambo

posts.post_title: F/S F/T Red Ty Cobb PSA 2.5
posts.post_content:
I recently upgraded my set and am looking to find a new home for this one!  Asking $2,840 net with insured shipping. Would also be willing to entertain trades of similar value in virtually anything pre war PSA.  Prefer upgrades to my t205 & t206 sets, though! 

Card is cross listed. 

Feel free to PM if you’d like to discuss.

Thanks!!
added a better scan. Thanks for looking
price reduction.  Would consider trades for t205, t206 upgrades for my sets or anything else prewar that's interesting to me.
Beautiful card sir. Congrats on the upgrade.
